title: MPS 2024.1.2 Is Now Available
description: We’ve just released an update to MPS 2024.1, which corrects several problems, mainly in the UI, indexing, and migrations. DOWNLOAD MPS 2024.1.2 See the full list of fixed issues here. Download this latest version here. Your JetBrains MPS team
author: Vaclav Pech

text: By submitting this form, I agree to the JetBrains Privacy Policy Notification iconBy submitting this form, I agree that JetBrains s.r.o. ("JetBrains") may use my name, email address, and location data to send me newsletters, including commercial communications, and to process my personal data for this purpose. I agree that JetBrains may process said data using third-party services for this purpose in accordance with the JetBrains Privacy Policy. I understand that I can revoke this consent at any time in my profile. In addition, an unsubscribe link is included in each email.
